The weather is mild and comfortable.
Common weather report expression: Often used for pleasant winter or spring weather

This product has a high quality level.
It is a relatively quiet neighborhood.

Common weather report expression: Common in weather and health contexts

Tomorrow’s low is minus five degrees.
The air temperature dropped a lot.
Measure the temperature of the water.
Common weather report expression: General temperature of objects or spaces

Common weather report expression: Can mean physical heat or illness
